title: Inflation rate in Brunei Darussalam 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly increasing from 2005 to 2007, and finally roughly constant from 2007 to 2012.

The line significantly decreased by 0.94 from Year 2005 to 2006,increased by 0.82 from Year 2006 to 2007,increased by 1.12 from Year 2007 to 2008, and lastly, remained stable by 0.82 from Year 2009 to 2010.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 2.09 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.11 was reached at Year 2012
min_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
